thread.title: Tom Jones and Priscilla Presley spark romance rumours nine months after his wife's death
thread.title_full: Tom Jones and Priscilla Presley spark romance rumours nine months after his wife's death

title: Tom Jones and Priscilla Presley spark romance rumours nine months after his wife's death
text:
Good friends Tom Jones, Elvis Presley and his ex-wife Priscilla, were pictured here in 1968 MEGA The singer and actress were spotted enjoying an evening out to dinner 
A friend added: "Tom has had a difficult year with Linda’s death and Priscilla has been an amazing support." 
When asked by the newspaper about bout Priscilla, Tom said: “We have been friends for a long time. She’s a lovely lady. We do enjoy our nights out together.” 
Last month, the It’s Not Unusual hitmaker and The Naked Gun actress were spotted going for dinner in Hollywood. 
They arrived in style at the A-List restaurant Craig’s in a white Rolls Royce. 
Ever the gentlemen, Tom opened the door for his friend and helped her out the car before escorting her inside. Elvis and Priscilla Presley: The King's iconic marriage in pictures Fri, October 14, 2016 Elvis and Priscilla met on September 13, 1959 during a party at Elvis' home in Germany, while he was serving in the Army. Express Pictures looks back on their iconic relationship and marriage that captured the attention of the world.
